sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-form>
      <v-container>
        <v-row>
          <v-col
          cols="12"
          sm="6"
          md="4"
        >
          <v-text-field
          v-model="value"
            label="Search"
            solo
            dense
          ></v-text-field>
        </v-col>
          <v-btn class="mx-1"  @click="searching" >
              search
              </v-btn>
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-form>
  </template>
  <script>
    import {eventBus} from '@/eventBus.js'
    export default{
      data:()=>{
        return {value:''}
        
      },
      methods:()=>({
    searching()
    {
      eventBus.$emit('search-value',this.value)
      
    }

      })

   }
  </script>
